name: Miss Peach
description:
《Miss Peach》is a pixel stealth strategy puzzle game
You will play the role of a police officer - Jing Shu, searching for your missing son. During the search process, you are caught up in a strange incident: you are trapped in the house of Duo. Here, investigate more truth while protecting yourself.

Roger Nissim

You feel like it's difficult to move forward in the process of exploration, and anything that can be searched cannot be missed. However, when faced with danger, I have no strength to fight back. Why are they so repelled and why do they seem so guilty?

Step by step

Gradually adapt to the switching and interaction of dual roles, and as time passes, make the decisions you think are "right". With the help of another character, find more clues.

Multiple outcomes

Is it to leave after rescuing my son, or to continue exploring incomprehensible mysteries, or to learn more about someone, or even to make everything seem like it never happened.
